text: N’iyo umuntu agezweho n’amakuba, asaba Nyagasani we amwicuzaho. Nyamara (Allah) yamuha ku ngabire ze, akibagirwa icyatumaga asaba mbere, maze agashyiraho ibigirwamana bibangikanye na Allah, kugira ngo ayobye (abantu) kugana inzira ye. Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Inezeze gake mu buhakanyi bwawe! Mu by’ukuri, uri mubazajya mu muriro
